Room.Name: Tower Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Tower Lane between Charybdis Avenue and Commerce Street.
Room.LongDescription: A very large and tall hotel is on both sides of the street, and if you look overhead you can see a walkway bridge which spans Tower Lane. The narrow bridge seems to connect both buildings together, and you see people up there looking down on the street. A sign on the bridge proclaims it to be the Royal Kista Arms. The Milsene Museum is east of here.
